resources.string: Automatically download attachments for incoming emails
Only download attachments when manually requested
The current use case does not have a tflite model. You can either manually place a tflite model under %1$s via PC or import the default model.
The tflite model of the current use case does not have the required metadata.
Model missing for this use case!

In order to use the sensors for on device prediction they need to match the pattern [TAG_PREFIX]-[SENSOR_SET_NUMBER] (regex ^[A-Z]+-\d+$).

Examples for valid sensor tags would be:
LW-1 (LW for LeftWrist and 1 for sensor set 1)
RF-3 (RF for RightFoot and 3 for sensor set 3)
However you can give the sensor tag prefix your own semantic (not necessarily body position), it's just important that the tag matches the pattern
